lastfm.title: Funky Stuff
lastfm.summary: Funky Stuff is a funk song written, produced, and recorded by Kool & the Gang for their 1973 Wild and Peaceful. The song reached No. 5 on the US Billboard Hot Soul Singles chart and No. 29 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. The track is known for its deep funk sound, driven by horns and an effervescent beat. It features whistles, chanting of the title, and a percussion-heavy rhythm that creates a party atmosphere. The song's creation was influenced by a unique recording situation Read more on Last.fm.
